reqs:
Pre-reqs: One of EECE 261, ELEC 211 and either (a) all of MATH 101, MATH 263, MATH 265, MATH 267 or (b) all of MATH 101, MATH 253, MATH 264, MATH 265, MATH 267 or (c) all of MATH 101, MATH 253, MATH 256, MATH 264.
if you do not have equivalent courses to satisfy the pre-reqs you will be dropped from the course in September

description: Waves and propagation; Maxwell's equations; applications including transmission lines; impedance matching and Smith charts; reflection and refraction; waveguides and antennas.
